resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106361</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106361</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086145</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Factors of Production</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Faktoren der Produktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Facteurs de production</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fatores da produção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fattori di produzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράγοντες της παραγωγής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Factores de la producción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of downloadable video clips on the theme of Factors of Production, with guiding questions for students. Clips are drawn from the following PBS WIDE ANGLE documentaries: "To Have and Have Not" (2002), "Pickles, Inc." (2005), "1-800-INDIA" (2005), "Border Jumpers" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung downloadable videoclips auf dem 
Thema von Faktoren der Produktion, mit leitenden Fragen für 
Kursteilnehmer. Clips werden von den folgenden PBS 
Weitwinkeldokumentarfilmen gezeichnet: "haben und haben nicht" 
(2002), "Essiggurken, Inc.." (2005), "1-800-INDIA" (2005), 
"Rand-Überbrücker" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de clips visuels downloadable sur 
le thème des facteurs de la production, avec des questions de guidage
pour des étudiants. Des clips sont tirés des documentaires 
GRANDS-ANGULAIRES suivants de PBS : "pour avoir et Démuni" 
(2002), "conserves au vinaigre, inc.." (2005), "1-800-INDIA" 
(2005), "Cavaliers de Cadre" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de grampos video downloadable no 
tema dos fatores da produção, com perguntas guiando para estudantes.
Os grampos são desenhados dos seguintes documentaries LARGOS do
ÂNGULO de PBS: "para ter e ter não" (2002), "pickles, Inc." 
(2005), "1-800-INDIA" (2005), Da "Ligações em ponte Beira" 
(2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di video clip downloadable sul tema
dei fattori di produzione, con le domande guidanti per gli allievi. 
Le clip sono estratte dai seguenti documentaries GRANDANGOLARI 
di PBS: "per avere ed avere non" (2002), "sottaceti, inc." 
(2005), "1-800-INDIA" (2005), "Ponticelli Del Bordo" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των τηλεκατεγραφόμενων τηλεοπτικών 
συνδετήρων στο θέμα των παραγόντων της παραγωγής, με την 
καθοδήγηση των ερωτήσεων για τους σπουδαστές. Οι συνδετήρες 
προέρχονται από τα ακόλουθα ντοκιμαντέρ PBS WIDE.ANGLE: 
"Για να έχει και να έχει όχι" (2002), "τουρσιά, INC." 
(2005), "1-800-ΙΝΔΙΑ" (2005), "άλτες συνόρων" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de clips video downloadable en el 
tema de factores de la producción, con las preguntas de guía para 
los estudiantes. Los clips se trazan de los documentaries 
GRANANGULARES siguientes de PBS: "para tener y tener no" (2002),
"salmueras, inc.." (2005), "1-800-INDIA" (2005), "Puentes De la 
Frontera" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086145</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106361</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/factors-of-production</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
